channel.title: Moparscape Item codes and server editing
channel.description:
Please stop posting all teh same questions about id's and that stuff!
Ok, here are the codes for moparscape: > [url=http://kulma.ath.cx/rs/items]Items[/url] > [url=http://kulma.ath.cx/rs/npcs]NPC's[/url] > [url=http://kulma.ath.cx/rs/objects]Objects[/url] *Currently down, should be soon up again*
And if you want to edit your server, please go leanr java and don't post here about it. If you're lucky, there is already a tutorial made for your question [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,51.0.html]HERE[/url]
Now stop spamming pl0x :D
